attributes.action: Stop MLA's being paid for doing nothing and teach them the spirit of compromise
attributes.background: Northern Ireland's political system is broken; it's people cry out for a functioning, devolved government. We are dejected by the indifference  of our politicans who put party one-upmanship before the real issues of a struggling people. Would Labour or Torys be paid for failing to attend Parliament?

rejection.details:
The salaries of MLAs are the responsibility of the Northern Ireland Assembly, not the UK Government or Parliament. Salaries are determined by the Independent Financial Review Panel. You can find out more about the IFRP here:

http://ifrp.org.uk/
